special_abilities.name: Plague
special_abilities.desc: Whenever the Rakghoul hits a creature with a bite attack, that creature must succeed a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or they contract the Rakghoul plague. 3d20 hours after being bitten, the creature will turn into a Rakghoul. The Rakghoul plague can only be stopped by cutting off the affected limb within one round of combat, or by applying a curative serum before the afflicted creature turns into a Rakghoul.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Rakghoul attacks twice with its Claws and once with its Bite on its turn.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 9 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit 10 (1d10 + 4) piercing damage.
